entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 12:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Wind: SE 36 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:37 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
